definition: to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: He gave his daughter in marriage to his favourite pupil.
sentences.chinese: 他把女儿嫁给了他的得意门生。

sentences.english: He also has several favorite students.
sentences.chinese: 他还有几位得意门生呢。

definition: to regard sth as valuable/to think highly of (a younger person, a subordinate etc)
handed down in a direct line from the founder
(abbr. for 泰山北斗[Tai4 Shan1 Bei3 dou3]) distinguished figure/doyen/revered authority
A famous teacher trains a fine student (idiom). A cultured man will have a deep influence on his successors.
term of respect for your teacher's wife
representative individual (of a school of thought)
